creator: kent@netbsd.org
text:
Created attachment 22371
Patch to add support for bit11

According to http://www.pkware.com/documents/casestudies/APPNOTE.TXT we should use bit 11 of the general purpose bit flag in the case that the filenames and comments are stored in UTF-8.

Unfortuanately, java.util.zip, Windows' zip folder ignore bit11.  WinZip supports for bit11.

not really a duplicate, only a subset

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 45429 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
